Articles.Content: As I await for my updater, can anyone recommend what Addons and/or Plugins I absolutely must have? I have a few, but I\'d like to see what people are using!

Damned Robotics Plugin & pack

Damned Aerospace plugin & pack

C7 Main pack

C7 Aerospace/experimental

C7 Experimental Gear Plugin

Get ALL of Jellycube\'s addons(Railguns, forward swept wings, mk 2 bicoupler, modular missile pack)

If you prefer rockets, Slisko Edition and BACE

If you like BLOWING THE S**T out of EVERYTHING get the Particle Cannon plugin.
